dcterms:description: This dataset consists of shuffled unique sentences from news articles, totaling approximately 829 million words, with a vocabulary of 793,471 words.

dcterms:description: A large corpus consisting of shuffled unique sentences from Google’s internal news corpus, totaling roughly 100 billion words.
dcterms:title: 100 Billion Word Google News Corpus

dcterms:description: The WMT’14 datasets for English to French and English to German translation, consisting of 36M and 5M sentence pairs respectively.

dcterms:description: A multilingual dataset consisting of twelve language pairs used for training a single GNMT model.
